location.name: Home
location.description: You are at home, playing a video game, when an Stinky monkey enters...

npc.name: Stinky Monkey
npc.about: He looks quite intimidating and stupid at the same time.
npc.riddle: Behold, it is me, Stinky Monkey. I am here to take your precious console, and there is no way of stopping me unless you bring me a freshly made pizza.

location.name: Albert Heijn
location.description: You enter the Albert Heijn. You start going through the aisles when you spot a baby in the trolley holding a can of premade dough.

npc.name: baby
npc.about: As you get closer you notice that the baby is wearing a tuxedo and in his tiny hand there is can of premade dough.
npc.riddle: Good afternoon, adventure seeker. My name is Nigel and I am a well respected illuminati member.

location.name: Jumbo
location.description: You enter the Jumbo. But a Jumbo employee is blocking your way.

npc.name: employee
npc.about: The employee looks tired and irritated. As he is arranging the products on the shelf you can hear him mumbling some incoherent words.
npc.riddle: What do you want now? I don't have time for the meaningless smalltalk.

location.name: Dirk
location.description: You enter the Dirk. There is a sneaky looking fox looking out of its hole.

location.name: Spar
location.description: You enter the Spar. There is a strange homeless man following you around.

location.name: Lidl
location.description: You enter the Lidl. A hungry student is frantically running through the store.

location.name: Park
location.description: You arrive at the local park. In front of you there is a tree and on the tree branch you see a crow. When you look closer you realise it's holding a piece of cheese in its beak.

location.name: Market
location.description: You arrive at the Albert Cuyp market. There is only one stand that sells fresh artichokes, but the farmer selling it is not very friendly.

location.name: Restaurant
location.description: You enter the restaurant you work at. The talking oven is left unattended.

npc.name: oven
npc.about: i am a talking oven, i think

location.name: Palace
location.description: You find yourself in Stinky Monkey's Palace. It's huge. And stinky.
